description: Try our easy to follow Lamb Shanks With Risoni Pasta recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Lamb Shanks With Risoni Pasta Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.5 cup fresh continental parsley, coarsely chopped
2 small thin zucchinis, sliced into rounds

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a large ovenproof casserole pan over high heat. Season lamb with salt and pepper. Cook lamb, turning occasionally for 5 minutes or until browned all over. Transfer to a tray.

Reduce heat to medium-low heat, add onion, garlic and celery to pan. Cook, stirring, for 3 minutes or until onion is soft. Add wine; boil for 2 minutes. Add tomatoes, breaking up with back of spoon, then add the stock and return the lamb. Bring to the boil, cover with a tight fitting lid and transfer to the oven for 2 hours.
Remove pan from oven. Add risoni and zucchini, stir through. Cover and cook in the oven for a further 8-10 minutes or until risoni is tender. Remove from oven. Season.

Remove shanks to a tray, spoon sauce among bowl plates, top with shanks. Scatter with parsley and lemon rind. Tip 1: Run a sharp knife around the base of each shank to release the sinew before cooking. Tip 2: Meat from the left over shanks can be shredded and frozen with the risoni mixture for another meal. Tip 3: This recipe can be doubled and cooked in a large deep roasting pan covered tightly with 2 layers of foil.
